Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed near Damen
ShortDescription: Brown Line  trains are standing near Damen due to a report of a minor fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line  trains are standing near Damen due to a report of a minor fire at track level

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
